main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) occurred in Salem, Massachusetts, in July 1952. These sightings included dark circular objects, luminous elliptical-shaped objects, and cigar-shaped objects with bright lights.
interesting points: The sightings were accompanied by photographs, two of which showed unidentified flying objects against white backgrounds and dark silhouettes.
Witness reports described the objects as hovering, moving at high speeds, and emitting intense bright lights.
The USAF evaluated the case as unidentified and concluded that some photographs did not contribute anything substantial to the reports.
One report described a round, silver-colored object hovering in the sky before accelerating rapidly and disappearing.
The incidents involved multiple witnesses, including a civilian and 2 adults with a child.
witnesses: civilian, Vere C. Chappell, and multiple others
